SITCM (Sydney Institute of Traditional Chinese Medicine) teleconsultations have been provided to the public during the pandemic lockdown, and they have been very beneficial for our patients and the community. It was found that there is still a need for teleconsultations after the restrictions eased - for patients who are travelling, where it is inconvenient for a patient to visit the SITCM teaching clinic or where our patients prefer a teleconsultation for following up, reassessment, etc. So SITCM would like to continue to provide its teleconsultation service to the public, which will reopen starting from 14 January 2022 and continuing every Friday 9:00am to 1:30pm. There are only 5 available booking sessions allowed per day. Please click the link to make your teleconsultation appointment. Our clinic manager will confirm your booking and send you a link for the consultation.
